meanings.definition: A deep, narrow valley with steep sides.
meanings.sent1: The hikers walked through the gul carefully, surrounded by tall cliffs.
meanings.sent2: The river flowed through the gul, carving its way through the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent3: The gul looked like a giant crack in the earth, as if a giant had split it with a hammer.
meanings.sent4: The gul was a natural masterpiece, a painting of nature's power and beauty.
meanings.sent5: The echoes in the gul made every sound seem louder, bouncing off the walls.

meanings.definition: To swallow greedily or in large amounts.
meanings.sent1: He would gul down his food so quickly that he often choked.
meanings.sent2: The hungry dog would gul his food without even chewing.
meanings.sent3: She would gul her drink so fast that she always ended up with brain freeze.
meanings.sent4: The vacuum cleaner seemed to gul up everything in its path, not leaving a speck of dust behind.
meanings.sent5: The greedy squirrel would gul down all the nuts in one go, not leaving any for the others.

meanings.definition: A large, greedy or selfish person.
meanings.sent1: The rich businessman was known in town as the biggest gul around.
meanings.sent2: She was a real gul, always taking more than her fair share.
meanings.sent3: The gul at the party ate all the cake before anyone else could even get a slice.
meanings.sent4: He was a gul for attention, always trying to be the center of everyone's focus.
meanings.sent5: The gul in the story hoarded all the treasures, never sharing with anyone else.
